name: Pearl Izumi Quest Road Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: Clip in and go. These sleek road shoes let you experience the advantages of clipped in pedalling, without breaking the bank. The smooth mesh upper keeps your feet happy on weekend group rides or your daily commute, with supple Velcro® closures for easy adjustment. 2-bolt or 3-bolt cleats? The choice is yours. Plus a rubber heel bumper means easy walking on pavement, even with a road cleat.Seamless mesh upper is breathable with bonded TPU overlays for durability.Velcro® closures gives a smooth and even fit to reduce pressure points.1:1 Composite Power Platform dampens vibrations and reduces foot fatigue.1cm rubber heel bumper grips pavement, even with road cleats.Compatible with 3-bolt (road) and 2-bolt (SPD) cleats.BioViz® reflective details.Sole stiffness rating: 8.
